First, I'll rant about archmages.

They are the most powerful class, other than the elementals they 
summon; that much we all know. However, unless you are holding down 
F8+M+shifter constantly while controlling them, it's hard to put 
Chain Lightning to such use that it becomes unbalanced.

As for Mind Control, it just never works. Summon Elemental is by far 
the most powerful move in the game; summon the most dangerous type of 
character in all of existence to help you out a bit. Maybe that and 
the might of Elementals are what makes an archmage so terrifying.

A complicated analysis would say that archmages, although not as 
effective as some other classes in direct battle, are the most 
powerful because they can summon the most feared enemies in the game.

Now I will move on to clerics.

Healing is one of the best moves in the game (unless it's a god-duel, 
in which case you have nobody to heal), but there's one thing I've 
never been able to work out. If they can heal others, why can't they 
heal themselves? Also, unless they have very good guards or a lot of 
blood around so they can raise their own, clerics die slightly too 
quickly.
